name: County Announces 2021 Public Health Champions
description: The County is honoring hundreds of people and organizations for their hard work to keep our residents and communities safe, especially during the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent:
During the most challenging public health crises in the world, it’s more important than ever to celebrate public health.
That’s why the County is honoring hundreds of people and organizations for their hard work to keep our residents and communities safe, especially during the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.
Today, the County released a video highlighting the 2021 Live Well San Diego 20th Annual Public Health Champion Awards Ceremony.
This is the 20th year the County is presenting the annual awards, which embody the County’s Live Well San Diego vision to promote healthy, safe, and thriving communities.
